original_text:
The cities in the Negev will be shut up,
    and there will be no one to open them.
All Judah will be carried into exile,
    carried completely away.
korean_text: 네겝의 성읍들이 봉쇄되어 열 자가 없고 유다가 다 잡혀가되 온전히 잡혀가도다

sentences.original_text: The cities in the Negev will be shut up
and there will be no one to open them
All Judah will be carried into exile
sentences.korean_translation: 온 유다가 사로잡혀 포로로 갈 것이며
